text: The New Media Award may refer to: *A category of the International Media Awards, London, UK *A category of the Freedom of Expression Awards by the Index on Censorship organization, London, UK * An award by the New Statesman magazine, London, UK *A category of the National Cartoonists Society Division Awards, US * A category of the Korea Drama Awards * An award by The Economist magazine * An award by Veterans of Foreign Wars, US * BAFTA "New Media Award" * Cinekid New Media Award
title: New Media Award
